title: Decide Minthara's Fate
content:
Minthara. Bring Minthara outside Moonrise Towers.

Decide Minthara's Fate Walkthrough

When you reached Moonrise Towers without helping the Goblins and Minthara is still alive, she will be there answering to Ketheric Thorm and Disciple Z'rell. If you attack now, Infiltrate Moonrise Towers auto fails and Moonrise Towers turn hostile. If you don't want to start a fight now, you can visit Moonrise Towers and perusade (Decieve DC 10 or Intimidation DC 14) Questioner Sumera and Questioner Jasin to l
